heartbeatOptionalParams.description: Heartbeat parameters provided by a CBSD

cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as returned from the spectrum grant procedure.

grantRenew.description: If set to true, the CBSD is asking for a renewal of the grant.

operationState.description: Represents the current state of operation of the CBSD.

measReport.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

rcvdPowerMeasReports.description: Report structured used by a CBSD when a measurement report type is EutraCarrierRssiNonTx or EutraCarrierRssiAlways

items.description: Report for a particular Carrier RSSI measurement.

measFrequency.description: Frequency of the low end of the measured channel in Hz.

measBandwidth.description: Measurement bandwidth of the channel in Hz.

measRcvdPower.description: Carrier RSSI measurement of the channel in dBm as per 3GPP TS 32.592.
